Material used.Description: Primary cortical neurons overexpressing mutant A53T α-synuclein were used.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased mitochondrial autophagy leading to neuronal death
Readout description.Result Description: Mutant A53T α-synuclein induced mitochondrial destruction, loss, and bioenergetic deficit in neurons.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal mitochondrial function and autophagy levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant mitochondrial destruction, loss, or bioenergetic deficit.
